feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
